scripts.tsc:all: npm run tsc:src; npm run tsc:admin; npm run tsc:client;
scripts.tsc:client: cd plugins/client && npm run tsc || true
scripts.build: npm run tsc && tsup && node mws.dev.mjs --client-build
scripts.test:pack: (git clean -dfx tests && npm pack --pack-destination tests && cd tests && npm install && npm install ./tiddlywiki-mws-$npm_package_version.tgz --no-save && npm test)
scripts.test: (git clean -dfx tests && cd tests && npm install .. --no-save && npm test)
scripts.fulltest: mv node_modules node_modules_old; npm run test:pack; mv node_modules_old node_modules
